body:
# LicenseKey2 

Is a simple update to Don Sweitzer [License Key Generation](http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/11012/License-Key-Generation)

It consists of a simplified Factory to make generating key’s programmatic easier as well as a cleanup in the code base to .Net 4

Usage guidelines:- 


# Important Notice

Please don’t consider the use of this code to be secure, you will also require additional layers of security to protect your programs.
name: Licensekey2
